ssl-policy.description: Configure SSL policy, which is a collection of certificate and certification agency's. Other features can use the SSL policy by referring to the SSL policy name.

policy-name.description: Name for identifying an SSL policy, the ranging from 1 to 23. You can only use underline, letter and digit. The letter does not differentiate the capital, and will transforms to the small letter.

mini-version.description: Set SSL version, surport tls1.1 and tls1.2, the defult value is tls1.2.

cert-ver3-enable.description: Whether to enable X509v3 verification for certificates.

crl-ver2-enable.description: Whether to enable X509v2 verification for CRLs.

basic-const-enable.description: Whether to enable Basic Constraints Field verification for certificates.

mini-path-len.description: Whether to enable minimum path length verification for certificates.

key-usage-enable.description: Whether to enable Key Usage Field verification for certificates.

diffie-hellman-modulus.description: Set modulus for diffie-hellman key exchange algorithm.

ecdh-group.description: Configure the ecdh groups for SSL policy.

signature-alg.description: Configure signature algorithms for SSL policy.

cert-loads.description: List of all SSL certificate file loaded by SSL policy.

cert-load.description: Configure SSL certificate file loaded by SSL policy.

cipher-suite-name.description: Name for identifying a cipher suite name.

exclude-rsa-kex.description: Whether to exclude RSA key exchange algorithm.

exclude-hmac-sha1.description: Whether to exclude SHA-1 HMAC algorithm.

exclude-ciphermode-cbc.description: Whether to exclude Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode algorithm.

dtls-policy.description: Configure DTLS policy, which is a collection of certificate and certification agency's. Other features can use the DTLS policy by referring to the DTLS policy name.

policy-name.description: Name for identifying an DTLS policy, the ranging from 1 to 23. You can only use underline, letter and digit. The letter does not differentiate the capital, and will transforms to the small letter.

basic-const-enable.description: Whether to enable Basic Constraints Field verification for certificates.

mini-path-len.description: Whether to enable minimum path length verification for certificates.

key-usage-enable.description: Whether to enable Key Usage Field verification for certificates.

ssl-cipher-suites.description: List of SSL cipher suites to configure.

cipher-suite-name.description: Configure name of cipher suite policy.

items.description: Configure list of SSL ciphers to configure policy.

early-warning-time.description: Configure the time when an alarm is generated before the SSL certificate expires.

interval.description: Configure the SSL certificate expiration check interval.
